data.name: UnableToConnect
data.value: Unable to connect to the Soter Wallet device, please make sure the device is turned on and within 1 meter from your mobile phone.

data.name: TurnOnWalletMessage
data.value: Press and hold the power button to turn on Soter Wallet.

data.name: PinPageHintMessage
data.value: Use PIN layout shown on the Soter Wallet device screen to find the location to press on the PIN pad below.

data.name: SetLabelMessage
data.value: A lable allows you to distinguish this Soter Wallet device from others that you may own.

data.name: LoadingMessage
data.value: Please wait while accounts and coin information are loaded from the device.

data.name: InitializeDeviceMessage
data.value: Initializing the connected Soter Wallet device.

data.name: RecoverSentenceMessage
data.value: On your Soter Wallet device, confirm you have written down your recovery sentence. This sentence serves as your device's backup. Secure it in a safe place.'

data.name: ConfirmWipeMessage
data.value: On your Soter Wallet device, confirm you want to wipe your device. This will remove all of its private keys and settings.
